      • runSSHExec

        public int runSSHExec(int timeout,
             java.lang.String command,
             java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String host,
             int port,
             java.util.List<HostnameUsernamePort> jumphosts)
        Run a command on a remote host using ssh to get there.
        Parameters:
        timeout - connection timeout in milliseconds
        command - command to execute on remote host
        username - username to use when username is not specified in hosts param
        host - destination host
        jumphosts - possibly empty list of HostnameUsernamePort objects
        port - ssh post used on all hosts in hosts
        Returns:
        exit code of command executed on host

      • runSSHExecWithOutput

        public ExecReturn runSSHExecWithOutput(int timeout,
                              java.lang.String command,
                              java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String host,
                              int port,
                              java.util.List<HostnameUsernamePort> jumphosts,
                              boolean unescapeJava)
        Run a command on a remote host using ssh to get there.
        Parameters:
        timeout - connection timeout in milliseconds
        command - command to execute on remote host
        username - username to use when username is not specified in hosts param
        host - destination host
        jumphosts - possibly empty list of HostnameUsernamePort objects
        port - ssh post used on all hosts in hosts
        unescapeJava - Should we unescape the output from the commands? (ie, \\n to \n)
        Returns:
        exit code of command executed on host

      • runLsSSH

        public ExecReturn runLsSSH(int timeout,
                  java.io.File dir,
                  java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  int port,
                  java.util.List<HostnameUsernamePort> jumphosts)
        Run 'ls -1' on a remote host using ssh to get there.
        Parameters:
        timeout - connection timeout in milliseconds
        dir - dir to ls
        username - username to use when username is not specified in hosts param
        host - destination host
        jumphosts - possibly empty list of HostnameUsernamePort objects
        port - ssh post used on all hosts in hosts
        Returns:
        exit code of command executed on host

      • runSSHExecWithOutput

        public ExecReturn runSSHExecWithOutput(boolean withOutput,
                              int timeout,
                              java.lang.String command,
                              java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String host,
                              int port,
                              java.util.List<HostnameUsernamePort> jumphosts,
                              boolean unescapeJava)
        Run a command on a remote host using ssh to get there.
        Parameters:
        withOutput - true if should store output in return object
        timeout - connection timeout in milliseconds
        command - command to execute on remote host
        username - username to use when username is not specified in hosts param
        host - destination host
        jumphosts - possibly empty list of HostnameUsernamePort objects
        port - ssh post used on all hosts in hosts
        Returns:
        exit code of command executed on host
